meanings.definition: A day of festivity or recreation when no work is done.
meanings.sent1: During the holiday, we all gathered for a big meal.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to the holiday season with my family.
meanings.sent3: The holiday was so fun, we forgot about everything else!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a holiday in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The holiday was like a colorful painting in a dull room.

meanings.definition: A period of suspension of work, study, or other activity, usually used for rest, recreation, or travel.
meanings.sent1: We planned a holiday to the beach to relax and unwind.
meanings.sent2: Taking a holiday can help recharge your energy and creativity.
meanings.sent3: The holiday felt like a mini-vacation from our daily routine.
meanings.sent4: His laughter echoed through the holiday like a joyful melody.
meanings.sent5: The holiday was a refreshing break from the usual hustle and bustle.
